gmc_hdfs.replicationsimulator

Class Dataitem

  • java.lang.Object
    • gmc_hdfs.replicationsimulator.Dataitem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataitemInfo

    public class Dataitem
extends java.lang.Object
    Data units are created by the users and are stored in the nodes. They are being processed. Each data unit is divided to smaller data blocks with fixed size.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Dataitem(int id, int size)
      Create a new object of data item
